output_list.reason: The 'transfer' function in the 'SuperToken' contract has an integer overflow vulnerability. The subtraction (_value) can overflow if balances[msg.sender] is smaller than _value, causing a division by zero in the 'assert' statement, making the entire contract unusable.

The 'distribute_100_tokens_to_many' function has an integer overflow vulnerability. The subtraction (_value) can overflow if balances[msg.sender] is smaller than 100000, causing a division by zero in the 'assert' statement, making the entire contract unusable.

The 'transfer_tokens_after_ICO' function has an integer overflow vulnerability. The subtraction (_value) can overflow if balances[msg.sender] is smaller than _value, causing a division by zero in the 'assert' statement, making the entire contract unusable.
The 'distribute_100_tokens_to_many' function allows the owner to distribute tokens to multiple addresses without any restrictions, leading to uncontrolled token distribution and potential token dump.
The 'transfer_tokens_after_ICO' function allows the owner to transfer tokens to multiple addresses without any restrictions, leading to uncontrolled token distribution and potential token dump.
